= Introduction =
The dicom-droid library for viewing DICOM Image files in Android



= Details =

This library (DicomDroid.jar) can be included as an external library in Android projects and provides the functionality of exporting DICOM images as Bitmap (android.graphics.Bitmap) objects and extracting DICOM header information. Check the Source for an example on how to use the library.
